entry.title: MikroORM 4.1: Let’s talk about performance
entry.summary: I just shipped version 4.1 of MikroORM,

entry.title: MikroORM 4: Filling the Gaps
entry.summary: After 4 months of active development, I am thrilled to announce the release of MikroORM 4. When I started to work on v4, the goal was to make it relatively small release, mainly to drop support for TypeScript 3.6 and Node.js 8, and to split the project into multiple packages, so we can have more fine grained control over the dependencies (mainly because of ts-morph having TS as a runtime dependency).

entry.title: MikroORM 3: Knex.js, CLI, Schema Updates, Entity Generator and more…
entry.summary: New major version of the TypeScript ORM has been released, read about its new features and breaking changes.

entry.title: Handling Transactions and Concurrency in MikroORM
entry.summary: How to handle transactions and concurrency with ease.

entry.title: Introducing MikroORM, TypeScript data-mapper ORM with Identity Map
entry.summary: This might be the ORM you’ve been looking for…
